뭐 친구창 보고 빼면 된다는데, 친창 비공개 되어있는 사람들은 답이 없음

Интересная игра!!!! Очень круто с друзьями

Primero, la idea del juego esta muy bien llevada a cabo, no tiene mucho misterio son 4 supervivientes intentando escapar de un asesino hay muchas posibilidades y el juego tiene un amplio recorrido de aprendizaje y una curva de mejora que se nota, se pueden emplear muchas estrategias, con amigos este juego se lo puede pasar muy bien a la vez que se puede pasar mucho miedo, ir aprendiendo las mecanicas de cada personaje, sus habilidades es muy interesante, si juegas de superviviente o de asesino te vas a pasar un muy buen rato. 100% recomendado. y cuidado con los sustos ;)

Um lixo completo, cheio de bug escroto.

Remember the Dev's dont care. takes them months to years to fix / balance / nerf anything that ACTUALLY needs it.

But Hey buy this new killer skin :D 
Dont even get me started with the blight PoV not getting fixed till 2 KILLERS CHAPTERS LATER. 
The twin update breaking alot of shit AND THE FUCKING TRASH THAT IS THE HUD UPDATE THAT NO-ONE FUCKING ASKED FOR.  
Now the next killer is so fucking weak in terms of power that it aint worth buying him unless ur a Green to brown rank killer cuz those ranks are the fun ranks but with dbd current fucking matchmaking system ur prob just run into try hard red / purple rank survivors cuz the dbd dev's cant balance their matchmaking to save their lifes. 
Fuck man they think MMR is going to fix this game cuz we all remember the last time they tried to add the mmr system :Smile:
The game is even more shit with the dumb SBMM system is in the game tired of having to sweat EVERY FUCKING GOD DAMN GAME.

Hell the next update next week prob going to break like 5039 things again knowing how this fucking shit tier dev's work.

MONTHS OF FUCKING WORK BTW :SMILE:

So is this game worth ur money?
Fuck no not unless u want to lose ur sanity like everyone who plays this game myself included @.@
Better to get it on sale or wait till it acutally goes F2P cuz with how the dev's work on this game this game isnt worth the 20 dollars for base game to like 100+ for all the killers / Survivors.

确实是个不错的游戏，出来这么多年一直都有比较稳定的受众足以说明。
但不得不说对于胆子不是那么大的人来说的却有点劝退。哈哈
不过被室友拖着玩了一段时间后慢慢习惯了，换句话说弄懂了屠夫机制还是有点上瘾的。
享受溜屠夫的过程，也享受朋友们团结合作，不抛弃不放弃的感觉。

Союзницу схватил маньяк и насадил на крюк. Я, как истинный джентльмен, на корточках подкрался к крюку. Торгуя своим анусом, ценой собственной здоровья, снял с крюка эту шалаву. Теперь на крюке вешу я, а бывшая заложница с ехидной ухмылкой заводит генератор. 11/10 кооперов года.

Like
- Fun especially when playing with friend
- You can be both killer and survivor

Dislike
- Many camper and tunneler, especially some toxic killer like buba that hard to avoid
Отличная помойка🤩😍❤!!!
